title: Gershgorin circle theorem
summary: In mathematics, the Gershgorin circle theorem may be used to bound the spectrum of a square matrix. It was first published by the Soviet mathematician Semyon Aronovich Gershgorin in 1931.  Gershgorin's name has been transliterated in several different ways, including Ger≈°gorin, Gerschgorin, Gershgorin, Hershhorn, and Hirschhorn.
